subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: The Bruins pulled away in the second half to beat the Golden Hurricanes, who defeated U.C.L.A. in a stunner in the 1994 tournament.
snippet: The Bruins pulled away in the second half to beat the Golden Hurricanes, who defeated U.C.L.A. in a stunner in the 1994 tournament.
